ehidi manthriwaraya wadiduratath meseda pawasiya. ‘‘1971 aragalayedi, 87-89 aragalayedi diwi piduwange, janatha wimukthi peramuna godanagimata kapa kirim kala ayage, me rate piditha janathawage, wamanshikayinge aramunuwalata patahaniwa yamin niladhari nayakayin katayuthu karana nisa eeta wiruddhawa pakshaya thula sanwadayak thibunu bawa oba dannawa.
apa pasal yaddi, mata mathaka hatiyata ee, hamuduru namak, udawaththa kale nagenahira bawume kotasak, thamanta ayithiyi kiya, buldosarayak ragena pamina, ema idama kotas karana awasthawediya.
rajaye rakiya karana aya wuwada aya waya gana etharam unanduwak natha.
ema githaya asuren kala nawa nishpadanaye adala narthanaya idiripath karanne shri lankiya sambhawayak sahitha boliwud nili jaklin farnandasya.
